name: The Crystal Catacombs
blurb: An exploration based, retro action/RPG platformer that incorporates a variety of roguelike mechanics.

rewards.reward: Desktop Wallpaper - You'll receive several, high quality desktop wallpapers consisting of the artwork from Crystal Catacombs in all their pixelated glory!
Pre-Order - (receive previous reward, plus) You'll be provided with a pre-order of Crystal Catacombs. Upon release, the game will be made available to you through digital download.
Special Thanks - (receive all previous rewards, plus) Your name will be included in the credits under a 'Special Thanks' section.

PDF Instruction Booklet and Digital Soundtrack - (receive all previous rewards, plus) You'll be sent a PDF copy of the official Crystal Catacombs instruction booklet. This high quality 'NES' inspired booklet will come complete with original artwork and information regarding many aspects of the game. PLUS, you'll also be provided with a high quality MP3/FLAC version of the Crystal Catacombs chip-tune soundtrack composed by the talented MaskedEpsilon.

Beta Tester - (receive all previous rewards, plus) Gain access to early builds of Crystal Catacombs during the Beta Testing Phase of development. You'll also be able to submit feedback to help make the game even better.

Gift Package - (receive all previous rewards, plus) You'll receive two digital downloads of the game, two copies of the soundtrack as well as one extra invitation to the beta testing. Invite a friend!
Silver Gift Package - (receive all previous rewards, plus) Your choice of one of several high quality 8.5"x11", signed art prints featuring the pixel art from Crystal Catacombs.

(NEW!) Boxed Version of Crystal Catacombs - Specifically created as an alternative to buying everything included in the 'Diamond Gift Package' - with this, you'll receive your very own boxed version of Crystal Catacombs! Inspired by the package/artwork from the 'NES' era, this nifty little package will also include a copy of the high quality printed, official instruction booklet. Note: The $100 tier and all tiers following are not included with this reward. Also, an additional $10 shipping and handling fee would be applied to overseas pledges.

Gold Gift Package - (receive all previous rewards, plus) A bunch of neat stickers, decals and buttons as well as a slick Crystal Catacombs t-shirt featuring official in-game artwork. Wear those pixels!\r\n\r\nNote: An additional $10 shipping and handling fee would be applied to overseas pledges.

Diamond Gift Package - (receive all previous rewards, plus) To show our personal gratitude towards your contribution to this project, we'll make a point to call you and personally thank you for your help. ALSO, you'll receive your very own signed, boxed version of Crystal Catacombs! Inspired by the package/artwork from the 'NES' era, this nifty little package will also include a copy of the high quality printed, official instruction booklet as well as a physical copy of the game in CD format... And they say you can't buy nostalgia, psshh.

Enemy Designer - (receive all previous rewards, plus) You'll work closely with Maxwell to come up with the look, name and even the attack pattern of your own unique beast. You'll also be fully credited as the creature designer. Note: A first come, first served basis will be used for designing the limited number of larger enemies available.

Boss Designer - (receive all previous rewards, plus) Conceptualize and design your own boss character to be included in Crystal Catacombs! You'll work closely with Maxwell to come up with the look, name, room layout and attack patterns of your epic monster. You'll also be fully credited as the creature designer.

Levels or Lives Game Pass - (receive all previous rewards, plus) From here on out, you will receive any future games, DLC content or digital applications developed and released by Levels or Lives. This will also include access to any early beta testing.  It's the gift that keeps on giving.

Guardian Statue - (receive all previous rewards, plus) Residing inside the chambers of the Crystal Catacombs, your likeness will be forever immortalized as a 'God of Celestica' in the form of an epic statue. Ultimately, you will play a key role in the shrouded mystery of the Crystal Catacombs...

Level Designer - (receive all previous rewards, plus) You'll work very closely (hey, not THAT close) with Maxwell to help create a \u2018secret world\u2019, complete with theme, enemies, hazards and bosses. If more than one person backs this reward, we'll assemble as a group to make this happen. We have to admit, this would be a lot of fun. However, if we were not to receive this donation, this feature would probably not end up in the final product.

Crystal Catacombs' Executive Producer - (receive all previous rewards, plus) By going so far above and beyond the call of duty, you'll take a personal stake in the future of Levels or Lives. By pledging more than half of our goal, we will respectfully give you the title of Executive Producer for Crystal Catacombs. You'll be right at the helm with us in helping create the best game possible. Naturally, we'll have to adhere to some standards like not affecting the principles or integrity of the game but other than that, you'll be considered an official and important team member.

Put Your Quarter Up - You're awesome. Do you know how awesome you are? You're so awesome that Levels or Lives is going to fly you out to the sunny city of Denver, put you up in a swanky hotel for the night and then Maxwell himself will take you on a tour of his stomping grounds. Complete with a feast fit for a king, followed by a trip to quite possibly, the coolest bar ever created - THE 1UP! You bring your game, Maxwell will provide the quarters... and drinks.
Put Your Quarter Up, the PAL Version - The same reward as the previous entry but this is made special for our overseas friends. Don't worry, I've got a translator on my phone.
